amendment.description: Amendment changes the reference year in the short title of the bill from 2011 to 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to strike "2011" and insert "2012" in section 1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Tipton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
